我承认我喜新厌旧，但这是我唯一无法抛弃的游戏中的最佳。2018年的今天我依然把最佳游戏提名填上了传送门的名字。希望早日出三，续写传奇。

There isn't much to say here. The Portal series has always been a story-rich and amazing game to play. This game makes you solve amazing puzzles by thinking literally outside the box, and everything in this game is great fun.
Excelente, es decir poco, sigo esperando la parte 3. :D

This a very interesting puzzle game from the gaming giant, VALVE Inc. This game take what was great about the first game, polishes it up, and makes it alot better. Also, there is a much greater story aspect of this, finding out about the history of aperture, escaping the lab, and a little ball who ends up being a big asshole. This game also just looks alot better than the previous game, and is a bit harder too. A very good pickup, essential in any steam library.

Буду краток. Игра, заставляющая перепроходить её много-много раз, ибо она сделана на 10/10. Разные игровые моменты, которые даже в какой-то степени учат нас жизни.. Благодаря стараниям Valve эта игра является одной из лучших в своём жанре. (я не верю, что это сказал XD).

Portal 2. What praise can be given about this game that hasn't been given already? It has more robots, testing chambers, and J.K. Simmons than the first installment, and thanks to the Perpetual Testing Initiative and Co-Op mode, you can play the game in a nearly endless amount of ways!

The only problem I can see with this game is that I'm easily susceptible to motion sickness. My own fault really, but what can you do.
